results.title: Modulating the antibacterial effect of the existing antibiotics along with repurposing drug metformin.
results.text_hl: Our findings indicated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Doxycycline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004318 @@@Doxycycline@@@ combination has a crucial impact on @<m>DISEASE_Dysentery_Bacillary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004405 @@@Shigellosis@@@.
